name: Woodstock 1969
description:
Woodstock— was a music festival in the United States in 1969 which attracted an audience of more than 400,000. Scheduled for August 15–17 on a dairy farm in the Catskill Mountains of southern New York State.

In this novella you will learn how one concert changed the whole life of the main character Cathy. Make a choice for her and change the fate of Cathy.Features
  • Visual novel game with sexy content;
  • Drastic story that will branch according to your "choice";
  • Surprising ending;
  • Steam achievements.
